member.name: M:ExpressionBuilder.Resources.PropertyCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the elements of the to an System.Array, starting at a particular System.Array index.
member.param: The one-dimensional System.Array that is the destination of the elements copied from System.Collections.ICollection. The System.Array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.

member.name: M:ExpressionBuilder.Resources.PropertyCollection.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

member.name: M:ExpressionBuilder.Resources.PropertyCollection.ToList
member.summary: Converts the collection into a list.
